title: Internship: Information Technology (f/m/d)
body:
About Lam….

Together we move the Atoms that move the World:

Imagine working on the front lines of innovation! As one of the semiconductor industry's leading suppliers of wafer fabrication equipment and services, our technology depends on finding and hiring the best and the brightest employees. We know that our dynamic, global team of exceptional employees is essential to our continued growth.


Lam Research - where successful people want to work:

We are a company comprised of people who work hard, deliver outstanding results and maintain a sense of humor during even the most challenging times. This is truly a rare opportunity. Lam Research is a market leader where our core values are not just words on the back of your badge. Given the criticality of this role to Lam Research's success, this philosophy starts with you.

Job Responsibilities

Employee type: Full time
Contract: Intern
Job ID: 129781
Desired start date: June 15, 2020
Duration: 6-8 weeks


As a member of our Villach / Europe GIS organization, you will be required to perform one or more POCs (Proof of Concept) with a typical duration of 6-8 weeks.


Currently Lam is focusing on contribution to follwing areas:

  • Client device performance / application performance monitoring
  • Labor time recording & reporting application, mobile app solution
  • Smart solutions, I4.0
  • Smart technologies leveraging Wifi location tracking
  • Efficieny increase for meeting room utilization

Main activities:

  • Requirements analysis
  • Identification of solution options
  • Implementation plan (timeline, resource requirements etc)
  • Collaboration with stakeholders and decision makers
  • Development of prototype
  • Lead testing and validation activities
  • Summarize feedback and learnings
  • Identify benefit
  • Present results to stakeholders
Minimum Qualification
  • University/FH (Fachhochschule) student
Preferred Qualification
  • IT infrastructure knowledge, specifically in network, security, server management, as well as client device managment
  • Development knowledge in C# and .net
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills in English
  • Basic project management skills
  • Basic presentation skills
  • Ability to work in a cross-functional environment (with users as well as with technical experts)

Compensation:

This position is subject to the Austrian Collective Bargaining Agreement for internship in the Metal Technology Industries. The minimum salary for the position (m/f/d) is EUR 2.000,- / Occupational group A or B gross per month based on a full-time intern employment.


Villach City a place to live

Under the link www.welcome2villach.at you will find at a glance the most important information about the daily life in Villach.

More About Us ….

Our work is everywhere you look – even if you can’t actually see it. Lam Research goes deeper than software or chips to the heart of the process that enables chip creation. So if you want to help power the components that empower everything, join us.


All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on the basis of disability.
